column1: 作词 : 艾德·希兰，本尼·布兰克，贾斯汀·比伯
column2: 作曲 : 艾德·希兰，本尼·布兰克，贾斯汀·比伯
column3: For all the times that you rained on my parade
column4: 你让我扫兴的次数从来都多得数不清楚
column5: And all the clubs you get in using my name
column6: 还常常淘气地冒我之名进那些夜店和俱乐部
column7: You think you broke my heart
column9: 你以为你伤透我心 但上帝 其实根本没这回事
column10: You think I'm crying oh my own well no I ain't
column11: 你以为我会为你夜夜以泪洗面 但其实也还好
column12: And I didn't wanna write a song cause
column13: 我甚至不愿写歌怀念你怀念从前
column14: I didn't want anyone thinking I still care
column15: 因为我不想让别人以为我对你还有眷恋
column16: I don't but you still hit my phone up
column17: 你依然会来电寒暄 而我却不是那么想接
column18: And baby I be movin' on and I think you should be somethin
column19: '亲爱的我都已经放下了 拜托你也早点释怀看开一点
column20: I don't wanna hold back maybe you should know that
column21: 我不愿再沉沦过往 而也许你也应该明白
column22: My mama don't like you and she likes everyone
column23: 我妈妈待人和善但对你却并不那么喜欢
column24: And I never like to admit that I was wrong
column25: 我也不愿去承认我曾经的错
column26: And I've been so caught up in my job didn't see what's going on
column27: 一直以来醉心工作却浑然不知我们的感情怎会落到如此田地
column28: And now I know I'm better sleeping on my own
column29: 但好在现在我独自一人却也能安然入睡
column30: Cause if you like the way you look that much
column31: 而如果你也喜欢上了现在的自己
column32: Oh baby you should go and love yourself
column33: 我会为你高兴 因为你确实应该好好爱自己
column34: And if you think that I'm still holdin' on to somethin
column35: '若你还以为我始终都放不下
column36: You should go and love yourself
column37: 那你就错了亲爱的 你也该和我一样好好爱自己啊
column38: But when you told me that you hated my friends
column39: 记得你曾对我说过你不喜欢我那些朋友
column40: The only problem was with you and not them
column41: 而现在我想对你说其实问题在于你而他们并没有错
column42: And every time you told me my opinion was wrong
column43: 你也曾无数次反驳我说的话
column44: And tried to make me forget where I came from
column45: 让我几乎忘了原来我也有自我啊
column46: And I didn't wanna write a song
column47: 而我也并不那么情愿去写歌怀念你怀念从前
column48: Cause I didn't want anyone thinking I still care
column49: 因为我不想让别人以为我对你还有眷恋
column50: I don't but you still hit my phone up
column51: 你依然会来电寒暄 而我却不是那么想接
column52: And baby I be movin' on and I think you should be somethin
column53: '亲爱的我都已经放下了 拜托你也早点释怀看开一点
column54: I don't wanna hold back maybe you should know that
column55: 我不愿再沉沦过往 而也许你也应该明白

column57: 我妈妈待人和善但对你却并不那么喜欢

column71: 那你就错了亲爱的 你也该和我一样好好爱自己啊
column74: For all the times that you made me feel small
column75: 你曾一度让我感到自己无比渺小 让我迷失自我
column76: I fell in love now I fear nothin' at all
column77: 而现在的我偶尔也会坠入情网 但却不会再像从前那般懦弱
column78: I never felt so low when I was vulnerable
column79: 内心脆弱不堪时我也未曾如此迷惘失落
column80: Was I a fool to let you break down my walls
column81: 是否是我太笨而被你轻松卸下心防 才难掩笨拙
column82: Cause if you like the way you look that much
column83: 而如果现在的你也喜欢上了原原本本的自己
